    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static void create​(int mode,
                          int stride,
                          java.nio.FloatBuffer vertices,
                          java.nio.ShortBuffer edgeIndices,
                          int count,
                          java.nio.ShortBuffer skirtIndices,
                          float height)
        Creates a new skirt.

        Skirt vertices will be appended to the supplied vertex buffer, starting at the current limit. On return, the position of the vertex buffer will be unmodified, but the limit will be updated, reflecting the vertex data for skirt that was appended.

        If the exterior edge forms a loop, the supplied edgeIndices should repeat the first-index-as-last-index to close.

        If the mode is GLES20Constants.GL_TRIANGLE_STRIP and the skirt indices are being appended to draw indices for the entire mesh, the caller MUST insert the indices for a degenerate triangle before invoking this method. The first index emitted will always be the first edge vertex index (0 if edgeIndices is null or edgeIndices.get(0) otherwise).

        Parameters:
        mode - The mode, accepts GLES20Constants.GL_TRIANGLES or GLES20Constants.GL_TRIANGLE_STRIP
        stride - The stride, in elements. If 0 a stride of 3 elements is assumed.
        vertices - The source vertices, may not be null
        edgeIndices - The indices defining the exterior edge of the mesh, if null, the first count vertices are assumed to be the exterior edge vertices
        count - The exterior edge vertex count, must be greater than 1.
        skirtIndices - The buffer to store the generated indices for the skirt mesh geometry, may not be null

      • getNumOutputVertices

        public static int getNumOutputVertices​(int count)
        Returns the number of skirt vertices that will be output.
        Parameters:
        count - The number of exterior edge vertices
        Returns:
        The number of skirt vertices that will be output to the vertex buffer as a result of create(int, int, FloatBuffer, ShortBuffer, int, ShortBuffer, float)}

        public static int getNumOutputIndices​(int mode,

        Returns the number of indices that will be output to define the skirt mesh.
        Parameters:
        mode - The mesh draw mode
        count - The number of exterior edge vertices
        Returns:
